scripts.deploy:root: mkdir -p .gh-root && shx cp branches.html .gh-root/index.html && gh-pages -d .gh-root -b gh-pages -m 'deploy root index'
scripts.deploy:main: npm run build:main && npm run postbuild && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages --dest main --add -m 'deploy main'
scripts.deploy:way: npm run build:way  && npm run postbuild && gh-pages -d dist -b gh-pages --dest way-submenu --add -m 'deploy way'
